content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking the initiative to involve others in your event planning and seeking their input and assistance. By doing so, you'll not only create a more authentic and engaging event, but you'll also build stronger relationships with your language exchange friends and Brazilian roommate.

Remember to stay organized, be open to feedback and suggestions, and have fun with the planning process! It's a great opportunity to learn from others, share your own culture, and bring people together.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you the best of luck with your event planning, and I hope your Brazilian-themed night is a huge success!

Boa sorte (good luck) with your event!
